sentences.en: Coordinate gage sourcing and managing usage, maintain and reparation of inspection instruments.
sentences.cn: 协调检测设备的购买和日常使用的管理和维护.

sentences.en: I must demand reparation for the injury.
sentences.cn: 我必须要求损害的赔偿.

sentences.en: I'll demand reparation from the company.
sentences.cn: 我将要求公司给予赔偿.

sentences.en: It was true , acknowledgment in most cases of affronts was counted reparation sufficient.
sentences.cn: 的确, 大部分的无理举动,只要认罪就时以算做足够的赔偿了.

sentences.en: It was true , acknowledgment in most cases of affronts was counted reparation sufficients.
sentences.cn: 的确, 大部分的无理举动,只要认罪就可算做很够的赔偿了.

sentences.en: No reparation could be too much for her to make.
sentences.cn: 为了弥补过失,在她看来无论做什么都不为过分.

sentences.en: Objective To explore denatured self skull bone application in skull reparation.
sentences.cn: 目的探索变性自体颅骨在颅骨成形术中的应用.

sentences.en: Offenders should be forced to make reparation to the community.
sentences.cn: 应该强迫违法犯罪分子对社区作出补偿。

sentences.en: The government agreed to pay reparations to victims.
sentences.cn: 政府同意向受害者支付赔款。

sentences.en: There is a clear demand amongst victims for some sort of reparation from offenders.
sentences.cn: 受害者明确要求责任人给予一定的赔偿。

sentences.en: They is still trying to make some sort of atonement and reparation.
sentences.cn: 他们仍在努力作出某些补偿.

sentences.en: Whenever you find your wrong doing, be quick with reparation!
sentences.cn: 无论何时发现自己的错误, 要尽快弥补!

sentences.en: Whenever you find your wrongdoing, be quick with reparation!
sentences.cn: 无论何时你发现自己做错了, 尽快去弥补!

sentences.en: Whenever you find your wrongdoing, be quick with your reparation.
sentences.cn: 任何时候当你发现自己的错误，要尽快去弥补和挽救。

sentences.en: Whenever you find your wrongdoing, be quickly with your reparation.
sentences.cn: 任何时候当你发现自己的错误, 要尽快去弥补和挽救.

sentences.en: You must make reparation for the sorrow you have caused.
sentences.cn: 你必须对所造成的伤害予以补偿.

trans.tran_cn: 赔偿（款项），修理，修理工作，维修工程
trans.tran_en: money paid by a defeated country after a war, for all the deaths, damage etc it has caused
